item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 24, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Wild – A Fast Linker for Linux (52 points | 24 comments)
2. A WebAssembly compiler that fits in a tweet (20 points | 2 comments)

9. Data Branching for Batch Job Systems (14 points | discuss)

14. The importance of favicons in website OSINT research (45 points | 14 comments)

29. A Cold War Satellite Program Called Parcae Revolutionized Signals Intelligence (57 points | 14 comments)
